# Duo setup
go mod edit -replace gitlab.com/mnm/bud=$DUOC_DIR

# Run di
di -d='web.Log' -o='gen/web/web.go'

# Run go mod tidy
go mod tidy

# Test di
go test main_test.go

-- main_test.go --
package main_test

import (
  "testing"
  "gitlab.com/mnm/bud/is"
  "myapp.com/gen/web"
)

func Test(t *testing.T) {
  is := is.New(t)
  expect := `&web.log{}`
  actual := web.Load()
  is.Value(actual, expect)
}

-- go.mod --
module myapp.com

require (
  gitlab.com/mnm/bud v0.0.0
)

-- web/web.go --
package web

type Log interface {
  Info(s string)
}

type log struct {}

func (l *log) Info(s string) {}

func Default() Log {
  return &log{}
}
